Avatar credit: georgy kurasov. Cubist, colourful painting showing a bored woman holding up a martini glass, wearing a tight red dress, legs crossed tightly. To her right: a seated man in a cobalt blue dress jacket and white shirt, black top hat & wearing shaded glasses, holding a cigar. Underneath the woman's seat is a grey bulldog, looking as nonplussed as the humans.
